name: Crimson Petals Mug
description: A bold and elegant design of red, black, and white floral petals wrapping around the mug. The sleek black handle adds contrast, making it a stylish addition to any kitchen.

name: Purple Bloom Mug
description: This mug boasts stunning purple flowers painted in a soft watercolor style, paired with a dark navy handle. Perfect for flower lovers and those who enjoy artistic mugs.
